head.title: July 16-22; Missile Offer by North Korea

hedline.hl1: July 16-22; Missile Offer by North Korea

block.p: America needs a missile defense, some say, because of countries like North Korea. One solution, according to Vladimir V. Putin, Russia's president, who is rallying opposition to themissile plan, is to remove North Korea from the equation. So he traveled to Pyongyang, coming away with a North Korean offer to drop its missile program -- if other nations provide it with rockets to launch satellites. But that's a big if. As a former Pentagon
official put it, it's still unclear just ''what is going on in North Korea.''
